Row.Text: The Zashiki-Warashi Disappear!

The zashiki-warashi, helpful household spirits that resemble young girls, have begun to disappear from the homes they protect in {1_City}, lured away by new opportunities in other lands. A youkai has tracked down replacements -- hobgoblins from Europe -- but these creatures look much uglier than the cute zashiki-warashi, and so people have begun to ask that they be exterminated instead. And others are suspicious as to why the youkai would get involved...[NEWLINE]
Pay the zashiki-warashi more money, so they return!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain 3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in {2_City}.[ENDCOLOR]
People are happy the zashiki-warashi have returned to their homes, while the hobgoblins have found employment elsewhere.
The hobgoblins aren't so bad! They're hard workers!

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Cost} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in {2_City}.[ENDCOLOR]
People have adjusted to the presence of the hard-working hobgoblins.
Both of them are suspicious. Drive both out!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Reduce enemy spy stealing rate by 25% in {1_City}.[ENDCOLOR]
Due to suspicions that they were spying on the village for other youkai, both the zashiki-warashi and the hobgoblins have been driven out.
A God of Fortune Visits!
The citizens of {1_City} claim that a god of fortune has been seen visiting several of the shops in the area.[NEWLINE]
A god of fortune always brings prosperity to those he visits.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Food in {2_City}.[ENDCOLOR]
Several restaurants and food vendors in {1_City} have prospered after the god visited.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold in {2_City}[ENDCOLOR]
Several merchants and artisans in {1_City} have prospered after the god visited.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in {2_City}[ENDCOLOR]
Several craftsmen and builders in {1_City} have prospered after the god visited.
The Village Is In Despair!

Recently, the citizens of the Ningen no Sato have been overwhelmed with pessimism and hopelessness. Local religious figures, sensing an opportunity to convert more people to their respective faiths, have begun prosletyzing, holding festivals, and even engaging each other in physical duels to determine which religion shall reign supreme.[NEWLINE]
Our citizens will be able to find support and reassurance in their faith.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and increase religious unity.[ENDCOLOR]
As a result of the duels and festivals, the faith of the people in {1_Religion} has increased.
Well, at least people will have fun gambling on the duels...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and 1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in each city.[ENDCOLOR]
The festival atmosphere from the duels has lifted people's spirits, and several people won quite a bit of money from the betting.
